title: Portfolio
slogan: View the story of my career.

steps.title: First steps
steps.text: At the biginning, I create game hacks, trainers, easy installers just for myself. I developed some webpages just for fun, but these were very succesfull, so because of this I got some order.

steps.title: The official learning
steps.text: I went to the University of Dunaújváros, and got the Network engineer degree. After that they asked me to stay in the scool to work.

steps.title: Work like a pro
steps.text: I worked at DUE and OneTech Kft at the same time. I developed portals, applications and learning materials to companies like Máv-Start, Gysev, Raiffeisen bank, Evosoft, Nébih. Tooke part in countrywide elearning projects with the school.

steps.title: The Big Blue
steps.text: I started to work at IBM ISSC Hungary as a web developer. I learned the agile view and design thinking practices to make my work more affective. Now, I work with the most modern technologies in wordwide projects and I develop apps in a very high level in node and angular.
